name: Glitch gun
description:
This game maked for Wowie jam 2 in 3 days.

Reach portal to win!

Use a gun to break a game!

Controls:

WASD or Arrows - movements
Space - jump
Left mouse button - shoot
Mouse Scroll Wheel - change weapon mode
R - restart game

Game "Glitch gun" by Serious07 @Serious_07

Jam "Wowie jam 2.0" by Jonas Tyroller @JonasTyroller

Song "A Journey Awaits" by Pierre Bondoerffer @pbondoer
